snippet: Shimon Peres presented a plan to create “a sort of United Nations for religions,” based on the assumption that religion rather than nationalism is at the root of most current conflicts.
lead_paragraph: Shimon Peres presented a plan to create “a sort of United Nations for religions,” based on the assumption that religion rather than nationalism is at the root of most current conflicts.

headline.main: Former Israeli President Proposes Global Peace Initiative in Talks With Pope
